Paragraph.Text: (FPL-HAL8-IS -A332/H-SDE1E2E3FGHIJ2J3J4J5M1P2RWXYZ/LB2D1 -PHNL0935 -M084F370 MKK5 CODDY DCT EBBER R577 ETECO/M084F390 R577 ELKEY/N0477F390 DCT LAX J100 MISEN RNDRZ3 -KLAS0518 KONT -PBN/A1B1C1D1L1O1S2 NAV/Z1Z2Z5P1M1 DAT/1FANSP2PDC SUR/A2 RSP180 DOF/250106 REG/N399HA EET/KZAK0047 KZLA0418 SEL/CQBR CODE/A4A4E8 OPR/HAWAIIAN AIRLINES PER/C RALT/PHOG KLAX)

BRIEFING: *PLANNED AT CI300 (WHEN ABLE) DUE LNG ENRTE TIME / MOD REQUEST TO PUSH EARLY IF POSS *XTRA TNKERED FUEL FOR POSS RWY SWAP AT DEP
THREAT: *POSS BUMPS IN THE VC OF ERROT TO ETNIC DUE CHNGE OF WND SPEED AND DIRECTION / BUMPS AGAIN NEARING THE COAST FROM AUDIA TO KLAS DUE AREA OF JET FROM THE NORTH
SPACE WEATHER: *RADIO BLACKOUT FORECAST FOR R3 OR GREATER IS 25% FOR JAN6-7TH
MEL-CDL C55-01 SLIDELIP OF THE APRON FAIRING PARTS
